text: Santiago Moreno (born 21 April 2000) is a Colombian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for América de Cali. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |América de Cali |2019 |Categoría Primera A |0||0||1Appearances in the Copa Colombia||0||0||0||1||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:América de Cali footballers Category:Sportspeople from Cali
